title: Nextup TextAloud v3.0.95 Incl Patch - TSRh [TRTKR]
description:
Nextup TextAloud

Nextup TextAloud - the program reads the texts, emails, Web pages and documents that you want to hear. Sound for further listening can save in WAV, MP3 or WMA. Following not only in English, German, French, Spanish and Italian, but also in Russian, - male and female voice. You will be surprised by the quality of his voice and intonation. Reads from the clipboard, text files, Word documents, PDF, HTML and integrates with IE, Firefox and Outlook. Now you can read your mail, books, large documents, news and so on. not looking up from the main cases and not wearing his glasses. The program allows the installation of additional synthesized voice engines for the diversity of languages ??and accents. 

What can you do with this program: 
â€¢ Sit back and relax while the program is reading your text 
â€¢ Save text to MP3 format for later listening to portable audio devices 
â€¢ Listen to a report on anything while you're in the sports hall, shops and other places 
â€¢ Helps to read the text for those who have no opportunity to read his disability or temporary circumstances 
â€¢ Create messages for your answering machine 
â€¢ Reduce eye strain from too much reading

â€¢ Listen to ebooks, during your employment 
â€¢ learn a foreign language (in terms of grammar or vocabulary, rather than phonetics) 
â€¢ The program is a great help to people with low vision 
â€¢ Add your notes in a PowerPoint presentation 
â€¢ Prepare for the Exam 
â€¢ Listen to text in other languages 
â€¢ Create audio files for computer games 
â€¢ And much more 

Convert any text into voice and MP3 for PC or download to MP3 player 
TextAloud is the leading text to speech program, available with exciting premium voices (including several languages) from ATT, Cepstral and NeoSpeech for the best in computer speech for your PC. TextAloud uses voice synthesis to convert text into spoken audio. TextAloud reads text from email, web pages, reports and more, aloud on your PC. TextAloud can also save your daily reading to MP3 or Windows Media files ready for playback on your iPod, PocketPC, or even on your TV with Tivo's Home Media Option. 

Version 3.0.95 
- Fixed problem with split tag when using a single character as the split name 
- Minor updates 

System Requirements:

Windows 10/8 / 8.1 / XP / Vista / 7

Homepage: http://www.nextup.com/
